info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Haywood County through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Waynesville, or near B.R. Parkway-Balsam Gap To Black Balsam Area, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesville, B.R. Parkway-Balsam Gap To Black Balsam Area, Black Balsam Area and Sunburst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
